title: Draft Environmental Permit Application
description: An agent needs to compile and draft an environmental permit application for a new battery storage facility.

tasks.description: Identify all required local, state, and federal environmental permits for a battery storage project at the given location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a checklist of all necessary permits.

tasks.description: Gather project specifications, including battery chemistry, thermal management system, and fire suppression plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all relevant technical documents.

tasks.description: Draft the main application form, referencing the compiled technical data and impact assessments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a completed draft of the primary permit application.
